metadata.title: CVE-2023-40283 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in l2cap_sock_release in net/bluetooth/l2cap_sock.cin the Linux kernel before 6.4.10. There is a use-after-free because thechildren of an sk are mishandled.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
